simple.escp.fill

Class FillJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.fill.FillJob
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListFillJob, TableFillJob

    public class FillJob
extends java.lang.Object
    FillJob represent the process of filling a Report with one or more DataSource. The result of this process is a String that may contains ESC/P commands for printing.

    A new instance of FillJob should be created for every process of Report's filling. The new instance can reuse existing Report or DataSource.

       DataSource[] dataSources)

    • Method Detail

      • addFunction

        public static void addFunction(Function function)
        Register a new global function. This function will have a lower priority compared to built-in function.
        Parameters:
        function - a new function that will be available for current and subsequent executions.

      • removeFunction

        public static void removeFunction(Function function)
        Remove a registered global function.
        Parameters:
        function - an existing function that will be removed from list available of functions.

      • addScriptVariable

        public void addScriptVariable(java.lang.String variableName,
                     java.lang.Object value)
        Add a new variable to current script engine that can be used by script placeholders later.
        Parameters:
        variableName - the new variable's name.
        value - the value of this new variable.

      • removeScriptVariable

        public void removeScriptVariable(java.lang.String variableName)
        Remove a variable from current script engine. This method will remove variable that was in engine scope. It can't be used to remove built-in variables in global scope.
        Parameters:
        variableName - the name of variable that will be removed.

      • getReport

        public Report getReport()
        Retrieve the report that will be filled by this FillJob.
        Returns:
        an instance of Report.

      • getDataSources

        public DataSource[] getDataSources()
        Retrieve all data source for this FillJob.
        Returns:
        an array of DataSource.

      • getPlaceholders

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Placeholder> getPlaceholders()
        Get available Placeholder in this report.
        Returns:
        a Map that contains all Placeholder in this report.

      • getPlaceholder

        public Placeholder getPlaceholder(java.lang.String text)
        Find and return a Placeholder by its text.
        Parameters:
        text - the placeholder's text. A placeholder text appears as is in template. For example, text for ${\@name} is "@name".
        Returns:
        a Placeholder if it is found, or null if no placeholder with the specified text is exists in this report.

      • fillBasicPlaceholder

        protected java.lang.String fillBasicPlaceholder(java.lang.String text)
        This method will fill placeholders with value from both supplied Map and Java Bean object.
        Parameters:
        text - the source text that has placeholders.
        Returns:
        source with placeholders replaced by actual value.

      • fillScriptPlaceholder

        protected java.lang.String fillScriptPlaceholder(java.lang.String text)
        This method will fill placeholders by executing the script inside that placeholder.
        Parameters:
        text - the source text that has placeholders.
        Returns:
        source with placeholders replaced by actual value.

      • fill

        public java.lang.String fill()
        Execute this FillJob action. This will perform the action of filling Report with one or more DataSource. This method will not modify the original Report.
        Returns:
        a String that may contains ESC/P commands and can be printed.
